attributes.action: put into law that emf emissions should be of no more than that household appliance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to ask the pm to reduce emf emissions of any device so no child or adult can suffer cancer such as lukemia. this say the government and companies and people lawsuits in the future. if someone is caught with a device that emits an emf of more the household product such as a tv set then they should be heavily fined and if deliberate emissions then go to jail for several years. this will protect the people in this country and hopefully be adopted worldwide and reduce cancer problems and lawsuits and stop other problems such as crime
